meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of cheddar cheese.
meanings.sent1: The cheddary cheese had a strong smell.
meanings.sent2: The sandwich had a cheddary taste that reminded me of home.
meanings.sent3: The mouse found a cheddary surprise in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in a cheddary hue.
meanings.sent5: The cheddary color of the leaves signaled the arrival of autumn.

meanings.definition: Having the flavor or qualities of cheddar cheese.
meanings.sent1: The pizza had a cheddary topping that melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The soup had a rich and cheddary flavor that warmed me up.
meanings.sent3: The cat's cheddary breath made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The old book had a cheddary smell that brought back memories.
meanings.sent5: The cheddary aroma of the bakery made my stomach growl.
